title: Penalties
context: ยง457B-12 Penalties. Any person who violates this chapter shall be fined not more than $500 for a first offense. For each subsequent offense the person shall be fined not more than $1,000, or imprisoned not more than one year, or both. [L 1970, c 63, pt of ยง1; am L 1983, c 135, ยง5]
